comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: Visitors to this photo page are encouraged to comment on this image here and then add their research/insights/comments about this image to the Inauguration project at the Flickr Commons group. Thanks!

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: Caption from same photo on Smithsonian's inauguration site: George Bush and Bill Clinton shake hands just after the inaugural ceremonies at the U.S. Capitol.

comment.author: 39680081@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called The White House & U.S. Presidents, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 33843800@N08
comment._content: In fifth grade, I remember watching Clinton's first inauguration speech in my history class.  My teacher, Mr. Fry, said, "Look at his hair.  It will be white in two years."
